creator: TeleprompterPAD
descriptionHtml:
You can use this app for free without any limitation, turn your device into a teleprompter or use your device in combination with a professional mirror teleprompter.

This app is easy to use, fast and intuitive. It allows you control from the screen or by remote control, although using a remote controller is not essential for using the app, you can buy it if you wish: teleprompterpad.com/remote-control/

Benefits:
- Multi language user interface: English, German, French, Italian and Spanish.
- Mirror mode.
- Speed ​​control.
- Adjustable text size.
- Open the script from your device or from any cloud service: iCloud, Dropbpx, Google Drive, etc.
- Copy and paste the script from any app or document: email, cloud docs, Whatsapp, PDF files, etc.
- Edit the script directly on the main screen. Ideal for small last minute changes during the recording session.
- Play-pause.
- Jump forward and backward
- Back to the start.
- Loop the script.
- Remote control available: www.teleprompterpad.com/remote-control/
descriptionShort: Fully functional app by the leading video-marketing company TeleprompterPAD.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-Updated engine libraries.
-Optimized disk space 40%
-Subtle graphics enhancements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-Resolved problem with the X button on the remote with QWERTZ keyboard (it affected users with a German keyboard).
-Removed auto-loop from script.
-Open files and copy-paste preserves the line break format of the original text.
-Small graphics and performance improvements.
-Removed small bugs related to bluetooth.
-Updated module for writing files (requires permission).

descriptionShort: Fully functional app by the leading video-marketing company TeleprompterPAD.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
*** IMPORTANT UPDATE: please uninstall the previous version before installing ***

-Current script is recorded in memory.
-Text settings are recorded in memory.
-New RESET button to return default values.
-Added "back to top" function on remote.
-Improved remote control sensitivity.
-Added remote control from pedals, from keyboard and from mouse.
-Any remote control is activated by default.
-More useful screen space.
-Small bugs resolved.

title: TeleprompterPAD

creator: TeleprompterPAD
descriptionHtml:
You can use this app for free without any limitation, turn your device into a teleprompter or use your device in combination with a professional mirror teleprompter.

This app is easy to use, fast and intuitive. It allows you control from the screen or by remote control, although using a remote controller is not essential for using the app, you can buy it if you wish: teleprompterpad.com/remote-control/

Benefits:
- Multi-language user interface.
- Mirror mode.
- Speed control.
- Adjustable text size.
- Remote control available: www.teleprompterpad.com/remote-control/
- Allows remote control from most popular pedals: Donner, iRig Blueturn, AirTurn PEDPro and AirTurn Duo BT-200.
- Allows remote control from keyboard.
- Allows remote control from mouse.
- The script and the settings are saved in the memory even after closing the app until pressing the RESET button to return to the default settings.
- Open the script from your device or from any cloud service: iCloud, Dropbpx, Google Drive, etc.
- Copy and paste the script from any application or document: email, cloud documents, WhatsApp, PDF files, etc.
- Edit the script directly on the main screen. Ideal for small last minute changes during your recording session.

TeleprompterPAD Remote Control www.teleprompterpad.com/remote-control/

---Buttons:
X: Play
Y: Pause
A: Fast Forward
B: Rewind
Start: ON/OFF & Back to Top
Mouse: Mouse
Exit: Exit
---Joystick:
Down: + Speed
Up: - Speed
Right: + Font Size
Left: - Font Size

Pedals [activate: open and close the side menu]

*Donner
---Mode 1:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind
---Mode 5:
Right Pedal: Speed up
Left Pedal: Speed down

*iRig BlueTurn
---Mode 2:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind

*AirTurn PEDpro & AirTurn DUO BT-200
---Mode 3:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind
---Mode 5:
Right Pedal: Speed up
Left Pedal: Speed down
descriptionShort: Fully functional app by the leading video-marketing company TeleprompterPAD.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
*** IMPORTANT: UNINSTALL THE PREVIOUS VERSION BEFORE ***

What's new in this version:
-It allows you to copy and paste in edit mode, now you can create scripts from email, web pages, texts in the cloud or even WhatsApp, just by copying and pasting the text.
-Small fixes and improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-The position of the script is saved in the internal memory and it will be remembered even after closing and reopening the app. Ideal for long scripts or when recording in different sessions, the line you were reading when you closed the previous session is recovered.
-Improved compatibility when opening text files *.txt with different encodings. Any *.txt will be displayed correctly, regardless of the language.
-Performance improvements and minor bug fixes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

-> Improvements: In the use of the remote control and in portrait mode.
-> Fixed: small bugs.

title: TeleprompterPAD

creator: TeleprompterPAD
descriptionHtml:
NOTICE: This free app is intended for use with a mirror Teleprompter hardware, this app does not record video.

You can use this app for free without any limitation, turn your device into a teleprompter or use your device in combination with a professional mirror teleprompter.

This app is easy to use, fast and intuitive. It allows you control from the screen or by remote control, although using a remote controller is not essential for using the app, you can buy it if you wish: teleprompterpad.com/remote-control/

Benefits:
- Multi-format: Supports opening most common text files, such as PDF, Word, OpenOffice and TXT.
- Multi-language user interface.
- Mirror mode.
- Portrait mode.
- Speed control.
- Adjustable text size.
- Adjustable margins.
- Remote control available: www.teleprompterpad.com/remote-control/
- Allows remote control from most popular pedals: Donner, iRig Blueturn, AirTurn PEDPro and AirTurn Duo BT-200.
- Allows remote control from keyboard.
- Allows remote control from mouse.
- The script and the settings are saved in the memory even after closing the app until pressing the RESET button to return to the default settings.
- Open the script from your device or from any cloud service: iCloud, Dropbpx, Google Drive, etc.
- Copy and paste the script from any application or document: email, cloud documents, WhatsApp, PDF files, etc.
- Edit the script directly on the main screen. Ideal for small last minute changes during your recording session.

TeleprompterPAD Remote Control www.teleprompterpad.com/remote-control/

---Buttons:
X: Play
Y: Pause
A: Fast Forward
B: Rewind
Start: ON/OFF & Back to Top
Mouse: Mouse
Exit: Exit
---Joystick:
Down: + Speed
Up: - Speed
Right: + Font Size
Left: - Font Size

Pedals [activate: open and close the side menu]

*Donner
---Mode 1:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind
---Mode 5:
Right Pedal: Speed up
Left Pedal: Speed down

*iRig BlueTurn
---Mode 2:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind

*AirTurn PEDpro & AirTurn DUO BT-200
---Mode 3:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind
---Mode 5:
Right Pedal: Speed up
Left Pedal: Speed down
descriptionShort: Could we improve this app? Submit upgrade requests: teleprompterpad.com/contact

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Improvements in importing large PDF files

descriptionShort: Could we improve this app? Submit upgrade requests: teleprompterpad.com/contact

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- UNIFIED REMOTE FUNCTIONS IN ALL OS.
- ADDED 4 NEW FUNCTIONALITIES TO THE REMOTE:
--SHIFT+X --> MIRROR MODE
--SHIFT+B --> PORTRAIT MODE
--SHIFT+Y --> - MARGIN
--SHIFT+A --> + MARGIN
- THE REMOTE NO LONGER REQUIRES ACTIVATION FROM THE APP, IT CONNECTS AUTOMATICALLY.
- ADDED SPACE AT THE END OF THE LOADED SCRIPT SO YOU DON'T HAVE TO FOLLOW IT WITH YOUR EYES WHEN YOU FINISH READING.
- ADDED ALERTS "ARE YOU SURE?" FOR RESET AND CLEAR TEXT BUTTONS TO AVOID DELETING THE SCRIPT BY MISTAKE.

descriptionShort: Could we improve this app? Submit upgrade requests: teleprompterpad.com/contact

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEW: You can now create script markers by simply adding ### to key parts of your script, so you can quickly navigate between markers.
NEW: We added 2 remote control button presets (Scroll Mode and Speed Mode) so you can choose the preset that is most comfortable for you.
IMPROVEMENTS: Fixed some file opening and remote button mapping issues on devices with different languages.

title: TeleprompterPAD

creator: TeleprompterPAD
descriptionHtml:
NOTICE: This free app is intended for use with a mirror Teleprompter hardware, this app does not record video.

You can use this app for free without any limitation, turn your device into a teleprompter or use your device in combination with a professional mirror teleprompter.

This app is easy to use, fast and intuitive. It allows you control from the screen or by remote control, although using a remote controller is not essential for using the app, you can buy it if you wish: teleprompterpad.com/remote-control/

Benefits:
- Multi-format: Supports opening most common text files, such as PDF, Word, OpenOffice and TXT.
- Multi-language user interface.
- Mirror mode.
- Portrait mode.
- Speed control.
- Adjustable text size.
- Adjustable margins.
- Script Markers adding ###
- Different selectable button presets for remote control.
- Remote control available: www.teleprompterpad.com/remote-control/
- Allows remote control from most popular pedals: Donner, iRig Blueturn, AirTurn PEDPro and AirTurn Duo BT-200.
- Allows remote control from keyboard.
- Allows remote control from mouse.
- The script and the settings are saved in the memory even after closing the app until pressing the RESET button to return to the default settings.
- Open the script from your device or from any cloud service: iCloud, Dropbpx, Google Drive, etc.
- Copy and paste the script from any application or document: email, cloud documents, WhatsApp, PDF files, etc.
- Edit the script directly on the main screen. Ideal for small last minute changes during your recording session.

TeleprompterPAD Remote Control www.teleprompterpad.com/remote-control/

---Buttons:
X: Play
Y: Pause
A: Fast Forward
B: Rewind
Start: ON/OFF & Back to Top
Mouse: Mouse
Exit: Exit
---Joystick:
Down: + Speed
Up: - Speed
Right: + Font Size
Left: - Font Size

Pedals [activate: open and close the side menu]

*Donner
---Mode 1:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind
---Mode 5:
Right Pedal: Speed up
Left Pedal: Speed down

*iRig BlueTurn
---Mode 2:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind

*AirTurn PEDpro & AirTurn DUO BT-200
---Mode 3:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind
---Mode 5:
Right Pedal: Speed up
Left Pedal: Speed down

Keyboard:

R, U --> FAST FORWARD (hold for NEXT MARKER)
F, H --> FAST REWIND (hold for PREVIOUS MARKER)
K --> PORTRAIT MODE
Y --> PLAY/STOP
J --> GO TO TOP
KEY +, NUMBER 6, Ñ --> MIRROR
UP ARROW --> TEXT SIZE +
DOWN ARROW --> TEXT SIZE -
LEFT ARROW --> SPEED -
RIGHT ARROW --> SPEED +
NUMBER 1 --> MARGIN +
I --> MARGIN -

Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind
---Mode 5:
Right Pedal: Speed up
Left Pedal: Speed down

*iRig BlueTurn
---Mode 2:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind

*AirTurn PEDpro & AirTurn DUO BT-200
---Mode 3:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind
---Mode 5:
Right Pedal: Speed up
Left Pedal: Speed down

Keyboard:

R, U --> FAST FORWARD (hold for NEXT MARKER)
F, H --> FAST REWIND (hold for PREVIOUS MARKER)
K --> PORTRAIT MODE
Y --> PLAY/STOP
J --> GO TO TOP
KEY +, NUMBER 6, Ñ --> MIRROR
UP ARROW --> TEXT SIZE +
DOWN ARROW --> TEXT SIZE -
LEFT ARROW --> SPEED -
RIGHT ARROW --> SPEED +
NUMBER 1 --> MARGIN +
I --> MARGIN -
descriptionShort: Could we improve this app? Submit upgrade requests: teleprompterpad.com/contact

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Fixed bugs that interrupted script playback.

title:
TeleprompterPAD
2.0.5

creator: TeleprompterPAD
descriptionHtml:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZAiivQkxaxQ

NOTICE: This free app is intended for use with a mirror Teleprompter hardware, this app does not record video.

You can use this app for free without any limitation, turn your device into a teleprompter or use your device in combination with a professional mirror teleprompter.

This app is easy to use, fast and intuitive. It allows you control from the screen or by remote control, although using a remote controller or pedal is not essential for using the app, you can buy it if you wish: teleprompterpad.com/pedal

Benefits:
- Official remote: www.teleprompterpad.com/remote-control
- Official Pedal: www.teleprompterpad.com/pedal
- Support for rich text: colors, highlights, lists, bold, italics, underline...
- Allows you to save your scripts in files on your drive or any cloud service, edit them externally and/or reopen them in the app.
- Floating menu with shortcuts to the most used settings and useful info.
- Multi-format: Supports opening most common text files, such as PDF, Word, OpenOffice, RTF and TXT.
- Multi-language user interface.
- Mirror mode.
- Portrait mode.
- Speed control.
- Adjustable text size.
- Adjustable margins.
- Script markers by adding ###.
- Select remote control button presets.
- Allows remote control from most popular pedals: Donner, iRig Blueturn, AirTurn PEDPro and AirTurn Duo BT-200.
- Allows remote control from keyboard.
- Allows remote control from mouse.
- The script and the settings are saved in the memory even after closing the app until pressing the RESET button to return to the default settings.
- Open the script from your device or from any cloud service: iCloud, Dropbpx, Google Drive, etc.
- Copy and paste the script from any application or document: email, cloud documents, WhatsApp, PDF files, etc.
- Edit the script directly on the main screen. Ideal for small last minute changes during your recording session.

TeleprompterPAD Remote Control www.teleprompterpad.com/remote-control/

---Buttons:
X: Play
Y: Pause
A: Fast Forward
B: Rewind
Start: ON/OFF & Back to Top
Mouse: Mouse
Exit: Exit
---Joystick:
Down: + Speed
Up: - Speed
Right: + Font Size
Left: - Font Size

TeleprompterPAD Pedal: www.teleprompterpad.com/pedal

---Click Mode:
Click: Play / Pause
Click & Hold: Rewind

---Hold Mode:
Click & Hold: Play
Release: Pause
2x Clicks + Hold: Rewind

Pedals [activate: open and close the side menu]

*Donner
---Mode 1:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind
---Mode 5:
Right Pedal: Speed up
Left Pedal: Speed down

*iRig BlueTurn
---Mode 2:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind

*AirTurn PEDpro & AirTurn DUO BT-200
---Mode 3:
Right Pedal: Play/Pause
Left Pedal: Rewind
---Mode 5:
Right Pedal: Speed up
Left Pedal: Speed down

Keyboard:

R, U --> FAST FORWARD (hold for NEXT MARKER)
F, H --> FAST REWIND (hold for PREVIOUS MARKER)
K --> PORTRAIT MODE
Y --> PLAY/STOP
J --> GO TO TOP
KEY +, NUMBER 6, Ñ --> MIRROR
UP ARROW --> TEXT SIZE +
DOWN ARROW --> TEXT SIZE -
LEFT ARROW --> SPEED -
RIGHT ARROW --> SPEED +
NUMBER 1 --> MARGIN +
I --> MARGIN -
